name: dollface_003 [sound on]
description:
3 in a collection of 15 

mannequin head that I painted, lit, shot on both VHS & HD (then converted back to VHS and processed), then ran through after effects for the final effects.  

score sampled: "don't cry dollface" by K.von Carné [unreleased music]

NOTES:  made this head back in 2015/2016 for a music video I directed, I thought there was something so creepy yet classic about the make up of the doll so I decided to just make a solo piece about it.  Once I started experimenting with the tape warp, I knew the possibilities could be endless to make it look different.  This dollface collection are the coolest moments I created & then had even more fun with in after effects.  

The score is a fun little ditty I made one afternoon-- once I started warping the playback time, I realized how many different dimensions/environments/feelings I could create from the progression.

Inspired by 50s/60s make up, Kenneth Anger, David Lynch, John Waters & Divine, the last ones left at a downtown dive bar, musky old Hollywood bikini bars filled with ghosts.
